line.token: * This file is part of the Symfony package.

* file that was distributed with this source code.
* Implements common logic for response classes.
* @var callable|null A callback that tells whether we're waiting for response headers
'Cannot get the content of the response twice: buffering is disabled.'
'JSON content was expected to decode to an array, "%s" returned for "%s".'
* Closes the response and all its network handles.
